ValidationRule.description: Required_for_Customer_Account_Maintenanc/Update RCS PO Amt/Date when below fields are blank 1. RCS PO Start Date 2. RCS PO Expiry Date 3. RCS PO Number 4. RCS PO Amount
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Invoicing'), ISPICKVAL ( Dispute_Issue__c ,'Customer Account Maintenance'), ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Price_Dispute__c, 'Update RCS PO Amt/Date'), OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New - Assigned')), OwnerId = '00Gd0000000SdP5'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Invoicing", OR( ISBLANK(RCS_PO_Start_Date__c), ISBLANK(RCS_PO_Expiry_Date__c), ISBLANK(RCS_PO_Number__c), ISBLANK(RCS_PO_Amount__c) ), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide RCS PO Amount,RCS PO Number,RCS PO Start Date and RCS PO Expiry Date
